title: Real Estate Appointment Setter (Voice | Remote)
job_overview:
Real Estate Appointment Setter (Voice | Remote)

Open to Beginners – No Sales Involved! With or without BPO Experience!
Work From Home | Full-Time

Are you a people person who loves talking and making others feel at ease? Do you enjoy meaningful conversations more than hard selling? We’re looking for a Voice-Based Appointment Setter to support our real estate consulting team by making calls to interested leads, building trust, and scheduling qualified meetings, without sounding like a pushy salesperson. 

About the Role
You’ll be the warm, helpful voice that represents our founder, Mr. Fariborzi, when reaching out to prospective clients interested in real estate opportunities in Dubai. These are not cold calls, these are warm or semi-cold leads who’ve shown interest. Your role is not to sell anything, it’s to guide, qualify, and schedule.

This is not a sales role. Think of it as a high-end client concierge — your job is to:
Start warm, natural conversations (no scripts-only robots here!)
Ask thoughtful qualifying questions (with the help of our script)
Book Google Meet appointments with interested, qualified clients
Send gentle reminders so they actually show up
Be that calm, kind voice that makes clients feel like they’re in good hands

Key Responsibilities
Call warm or semi-cold leads using our approved calling system
Qualify leads based on goals, budget, location preferences, etc.
Book meetings directly into the calendar with reminders
Send friendly follow-ups via WhatsApp and email
Track key lead details using our ClickUp system

What We’re Looking For
Fluent spoken English with a soft, neutral, or calming accent
Able to build rapport quickly and sound trustworthy, not salesy
Comfortable using Google Meet and WhatsApp, with the willingness to learn ClickUp
Must have stable internet, a laptop/PC, and a smartphone
Bonus: Experience in appointment setting or customer support/BPO

Compensation & Schedule
Base Pay: $480 USD/month
Bonuses:
$ for every appointment you successfully book that actually shows up.
Get $$$ additional bonus for every deal that closes from a client you helped bring in.
Work Hours: Full-time, work from home | Monday to Friday | 2 PM – 10 PM PHT (flexible within range)

Apply Now:
Fill out this quick form to show us what you’ve got:
[Add an ‘h’ at the beginning and paste it into your browser]
